text:
Congratulations to Dr Sahin and Dr Türeci on receiving today Germany’s #Order_of_Merit for developing the #COVID19 #vaccine!

We are proud to have supported their company @BioNTech_Group’s early development through #EURegionalFunds.

https://t.co/2LAlgmh3Fr

#StrongerTogether https://t.co/QpN8OpRRlk
